author: Joseph Holt
title: ABC gets it, but Roseanne and Trump do not
description: Joseph Holt writes that neither Roseanne Barr nor President Trump seemed to get the real message of the show cancellation this week. Rather than continuing to condemn the racism at the heart of her original tweet, Barr pivoted from her apology to blaming Ambien, and then retweeted claims that she had been treated unfairly by ABC. Trump meanwhile also reached deep into his sense of self-pity to blame Disney CEO Bob Iger for not apologizing to him for an ESPN staffer's comments.
